name: Mister Negative
text: When Revealed: Attach a set-aside copy of Darkforce Energy to Mister Negative. Negative Drain — Forced Response: After an ally is defeated by anything other than consequential damage, attach a set-aside copy of Darkforce Energy to Mister Negative.

name: Mister Negative
text: When Revealed: Attach a set-aside copy of Darkforce Energy to Mister Negative. Negative Drain — Forced Response: After an ally is defeated by anything other than consequential damage, attach a set-aside copy of Darkforce Energy to Mister Negative.

name: Mister Negative
text: When Revealed: Attach a set-aside copy of Darkforce Energy to Mister Negative. Negative Drain — Forced Response: After an ally is defeated by anything other than consequential damage, attach a set-aside copy of Darkforce Energy to Mister Negative.

name: Demons Unleashed
text: Contents: Mister Negative (I) and Mister Negative (II). (Mister Negative (II) and Mister Negative (III) instead for Expert Mode.) Mister Negative and Standard encounter sets. One or two modular encounter sets (recommended: Sinister Syndicate and City in Chaos). When Revealed: Set aside each copy of Darkforce Energy. Reveal Mister Negative and attach Negative Charge to him [[superpower]] side up (or flip for an easier game). Reveal the Focused Negativity side scheme. Each player puts an [[inner demon]] minion (Demon Brute or Demon Swordsmen) into play engaged with them.

name: Demons Unleashed
text: The two-faced Martin Li escalates his bitter feud with Mayor Norman Osborn. Imbue — Forced Response: After a minion enters play, move a copy of Darkforce Energy from Mister Negative to that minion. Forced Interrupt: When Mister Negative is defeated, deal each player a facedown encounter card.

name: Reign of Terror
text: As Li and the Inner Demons spread fire across the city, total anarchy is near. When Revealed: Place 1 acceleration token on the main scheme. Then, each player searches the encounter deck (or, if necessary, the discard pile) for a minion and puts it into play engaged with them. Attach a set-aside copy of Darkforce Energy to Mister Negative.

name: Reign of Terror
text: Imbue — Forced Response: After a minion enters play, move a copy of Darkforce Energy from Mister Negative to that minion. Forced Interrupt: When Mister Negative is defeated, deal each player a facedown encounter card. If this scheme is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Darkforce Energy
text: Permanent. [star] Forced Interrupt: When attached enemy attacks, give it a boost card. This attack gains overkill and piercing. Then, set this card aside. Forced Response: After attached character leaves play, set this card aside.

name: Negative Charge
text: Permanent. Negative Shield — Forced Response: After a stunned or confused status card is placed on Mister Negative, choose: • Discard that status card and deal 1 damage to Mister Negative. • Attach a set-aside copy of Darkforce Energy to him.

name: Negative Charge
text: Permanent. Set-aside copies of Darkforce Energy may be stored under this card while they are set-aside. "Li's pain and anger are fueling his power." —Spider-Man

name: Negative's Sword
text: Attach to Mister Negative. [star] While Mister Negative is attacking, this card gains [amplify]. Hero Response: After Mister Negative attacks you, spend [physical][physical] resources → discard this card. "Beat the demon? I AM the demon!"

name: Anti-Venom
text: Forced Response: After you defeat Anti-Venom, put him back into play under your control as a [[controlled]] ally. He gains Victory 0 and [hazard]. His THW is equal to his printed SCH and he takes 3 consequential damage after he thwarts or attacks.

name: Cloak & Dagger
text: Forced Response: After you defeat Cloak & Dagger, put them back into play under your control as a [[controlled]] ally. They gain Victory 0 and [acceleration]. Their THW is equal to their printed SCH and they take 2 consequential damage after they thwart or attack.

name: Demon Brute
text: When Revealed: Attach a set-aside copy of Darkforce Energy to Mister Negative. [star] Boost: Deal 1 damage to your hero or confuse your identity.

name: Demon Swordsmen
text: When Revealed: Attach a set-aside copy of Darkforce Energy to Mister Negative. [star] Boost: Deal 1 damage to your hero or stun your identity.

name: Overdrive
text: [star] Forced Response: After Overdrive activates against you, shuffle him into the encounter deck. [star] Boost: Put this minion into play engaged with you.

name: Deceived by Martin Li
text: Victory 0. When Revealed: Exhaust each alter-ego. Alter-Ego Action: Spend [mental][mental] resources → remove threat from this scheme equal to your alter-ego's REC. [hazard]

name: Demonic Oppression
text: The demons press in on you... Each [[inner demon]] minion gains guard. When Revealed: Choose: deal yourself 1 facedown encounter card OR discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until an [[inner demon]] minion is discarded. Reveal that minion. Then, it activates against you.

name: Focused Negativity
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. Forced Interrupt: When this scheme is defeated, shuffle it and each [[inner demon]] in the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. [acceleration]

name: Held Hostage
text: When Revealed: Place a [[persona]] support you control faceup beneath this card. If you cannot, this card gains surge; then, search your hand, deck, and discard pile for a [[persona]] support and place it faceup beneath this card. When Defeated: Return each [[persona]] support here to its owner's hand. [acceleration]

name: Mayor Osborn in Danger
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. Forced Response: After a minion enters play, add 3 threat to this scheme. Then, if there is at least 15 threat here and this card was not revealed this phase, deal each player an encounter card, attach a set-aside copy of Darkforce Energy to Mister Negative, and add this card to the victory display.

name: Workplace Bombing
text: The city's chaos emboldens Negative and the Inner Demons. Hinder 1[per_hero]. Forced Interrupt: When this card enters play and when the villain phase begins, attach a set-aside copy of Darkforce Energy to Mister Negative. [crisis]

name: Corrupting Touch
text: When Revealed: Exhaust a character you control. Heal 3 damage from Mister Negative and give him a tough status card. [star] Boost: Give this enemy 1 additional boost card for this activation. If this is an attack, it gains overkill and piercing.

name: Dark Purpose
text: When Revealed: Choose: • Attach a set-aside copy of Darkforce Energy to Mister Negative. This card gains surge. • Mister Negative schemes. Then, you may remove a copy of Darkforce Energy from Mister Negative and set it aside.

name: Demon Form
text: When Revealed: You may change form. If you are in hero form, attach a set-aside copy of Darkforce Energy to Mister Negative. Mister Negative attacks you (even in alter-ego form). "None of this is real!" —Spider-Man "What is more real than fear?" —Mister Negative

name: Negative Pressure
text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Reveal that minion. Choose: • That minion activates against you. • Attach a set-aside copy of Darkforce Energy to Mister Negative.

name: Negative Surge
text: When Revealed: Choose: • If Mister Negative has no copies of Darkforce Energy attached to him, attach a set-aside copy to him. • Mister Negative activates against you. [star] Boost: Deal this card to yourself as a facedown encounter card.

name: Spreading Fear
text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a [[criminal]] minion or the Mayor Osborn in Danger side scheme is discarded. Reveal that card. [star] Boost: Exhaust a [[persona]] support you control.
